thread.title: mophie Launches Its Most Compact juice pack Battery Case Ever
thread.title_full: mophie Launches Its Most Compact juice pack Battery Case Ever

author: admin
title: mophie Launches Its Most Compact juice pack Battery Case Ever
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 7:00 AM   mophie 
ORANGE COUNTY, Calif., Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- mophie--the #1 selling mobile battery case in North America(1), and innovator of intelligent solutions for mobile devices--announced today the juice pack(® )reserve(TM) made for iPhone® 6 , the company's most compact battery case to date. The distinctly thin, noticeably lightweight design provides more than 60% extra battery life and everyday protection in a variety of colors for $59.95. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150916/267065 
"Industry-leading design is one of the core ideals mophie was built upon," said Daniel Huang, mophie CEO and Co-Founder. "For the juice pack reserve, we leveraged our years of engineering and design experience to create the slimmest battery case people have ever held." 
Ergonomically designed, the juice pack(® )reserve(TM) fits securely and comfortably in your hand. It also includes mophie's high-impact protection system , a series of rubberized support pads placed around the case interior. Digital Power Management(TM) --also known as smart charging circuitry--provides your device with the perfect amount of power for a safe, quick charge. 
The juice pack(® )reserve(TM) is equipped with a powerful 1,840mAh rechargeable lithium-ion polymer battery which allows users to enjoy up to 8.4 additional hours of talk time, 6.6 additional hours of web browsing, 6 additional hours of video playback, and 30 additional hours of music playback. 
Featuring mophie's Priority+(TM) charge and sync, the juice pack(® )reserve(TM) allows the iPhone (® ) 6 to charge before the juice pack(® ) itself, and enables pass-through charge and sync while connected to a PC or Mac. Designed with pass-through volume and power buttons, as well as mophie's proprietary mute switch, the juice pack(®) maintains full functionality of the mobile device. 
The mophie juice pack(® )reserve(TM) made for iPhone® 6 is currently available for pre-order in black, white, blue, purple and pink at mophie.com for $59.95. 
For the latest details and updates about all mophie products, follow mophie on Facebook , twitter , and Instagram , and register at mophie.com/innovation . 
mophie, the #1 selling battery case manufacturer in North America, is a California-based, award-winning designer and manufacturer that empowers the mobile world to do more. Widely acclaimed for innovative mobile solutions, mophie is the proud developer of the original juice pack(®). mophie products are recognized for style and engineered for performance, providing a seamless integration of hardware, software and design. mophie has operations in California, Michigan, Netherlands, Hong Kong, and China. Products described above can be found at Best Buy and mophie.com . Follow us on Facebook , twitter , and Instagram (@mophie). 
1. "US Tech Geo Level Monthly Retail - US Retail Monthly Store Level", July 2015, available from The NPD Group, Inc. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/mophie-launches-its-most-compact-juice-pack-battery-case-ever--300143938.html 
SOURCE mophie
